item.title: Base64 Online Tool
item.description: Base64 Encoder / Decoder Online Base64 Decode is a simple utility for decoding or encoding base64 data to plain text. Encode Decode Enter the text for Clear Base64 Base64 What exactly is Base64? Base64 is a family of binary-to-text encoding techniques that convert binary data in an ASCII string format into a radix-64 representation. Base64 is commonly used to encode binary data in email messages and web pages.
